Author: paperklipp
Text: This is the opposite of the other commenterâ€™s advice and obviously everyone is different, but a full day of fasting followed by a return to my normal restriction routine (vlcd omad) always does the trick for me.

Author: coffidu
Text: What helps me is to try eating "normally" (at my TDEE) for a few days. It gets you to a point where you're eating *enough*, but not so much that you're binging. For me, it can help reset hunger patterns which also helps in reducing binging.
